name: The Clutch ASTS
description:
The model you are looking at is the base model with an upgraded, polished aluminum spool.  The frame is 100% aluminum (the same material in boat towers).  All materials are custom-made for towing, and have been engineered for the tough abuse that riders put on them.  Check us out at http:/watch?v=zVnSoDly2B8

 Part specs are listed below:
Frame: All alminum frame (safe for salt water use) with sliding engine mount system for belt and chain adjustment

Transmission: TAV Torq converter kit to achieve deep water starts and optimum speed control.

Engine: 6.5 HP

Spool:  All aluminum and stainless parts with adjustable 6" and 9 "diameter reel sizes.

Line:  500 feet

fairlead roller:  all stainless and powder coated steel for towing at almost any angle

Mount:  2" hitch reciever

Booklet: Instructions on how to operate and maintain your Clutch ASTS.
